channel.description: Recent content in Ruby on Avelino

item.title: Swift Language (Apple) first steps
item.description: Apple launched the Swift language (Looking for the Swift parallel scripting language? Please visit http://swift-lang.org) at WWDC 2014. A modern language to program for Mac and iOS! Strongly typed language, where you explicitly what type (variable, arguments, and function returns), syntax reminds dynamic languages with Python, Go, Ruby and JavaScript. Apple offers a free comprehensive guide on language in HTML and iBook formats. We can put zero left freely to improve readability, insert _ to separate groups of numbers and add the + in front.
